histcon module¶

‘Builds the HISTCON network.

class histcon.HistconModel(data_directory)[source]¶

Bases: object

Model containing all functions necessary to build input dataset pipelines, build a training and validation set model, and monitor and execute training.

build_inputs()[source]¶

Construct input for HISTCON evaluation.

Parameters:sess – active tensorflow session
Returns:Images. 4D tensor of [batch_size, IMAGE_SIZE, IMAGE_SIZE, 3] size. next_batch_labels: Labels. 1D tensor of [batch_size] size.
Return type:next_batch_images
build_train_op(total_loss, global_step)[source]¶

Train the HISTCON model.

Create an optimizer and apply to all trainable variables. Add moving average for all trainable variables.

Parameters:
  • total_loss – Total loss from loss().
  • global_step – Integer variable counting the number of training steps processed.
Returns:

op for training.
Return type:

train_op
gen_filenames_op(dir_string)[source]¶
generate_batched_dataset(filenames, labels)[source]¶
loss(logits, labels)[source]¶

Add L2Loss to all trainable variables, and a summary for “Loss” and “Loss/avg”.

Parameters:
  • logits – Logits from inference().
  • labels – Labels from distorted_inputs() or inputs(). 1D tensor of shape [batch_size]
Returns:

Loss Tensor of type float.

train(retrain_model=None, retrain_weights=None)[source]¶

Train HISTCON for a number of steps, according to flags set by the argument parser.
